DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial conduct examine effectiveness traditional home exercise program versus kinetic chain home exercise program treatment outcome overhead athlete shoulder impingement syndrome . Primary outcome measure reduction pain disability , improvement functionality sport performance . Secondary outcome measure strength , mobility , flexibility functional performance .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Kinetic Chain Training Treatment Outcome Overhead Athletes With Impingement
DOC.criteria: Symptoms shoulder impingement dominant side least 3 month least 3 follow test consider positive Jobe Hawkins Neer Painful arc elevation Pain lack force production isometric external rotation Apprehension test Relocation test Performing overhead sport least 3 hours/week Shoulder pain interferes sport activity They treatment shoulder pain History shoulder dislocation subluxation History orthopedic surgery No complaint pain dysfunction upper limb ( except impingement relate complaint dominant shoulder ) , low limb spine last 6 month Currently take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication Received steroid injection past 12 month Participating another study Known systemic disease Known structural disease
